text: Field guns are one of two main types of field artillery. Field guns fire a heavy shell on a relatively level trajectory from a longer barrel. This gives very high muzzle velocity and good range performance. Field guns are best for giving long range fire support and counter-battery fire. This list has two categories; field guns that were moved (towed) by horses or vehicles, and guns that could move themselves (self propelled) guns. ==Towed field guns== Caliber (mm) Weapon name Country of origin Period 70 Whitworth rifled breech loader American Civil War 75 Canon de 75 modèle 1897 World War I / World War II 75 Canon de 75 modèle 1905 Schneider World War I / World War II 75 Canon de 75 modèle 1912 Schneider World War I 75 Canon de 75 modèle 1914 Schneider World War I 75 Canon de 75 mle GP1 World War I 75 75 mm Gun M1897 World War I / World War II 75 Cannone da 75/27 modello 06 World War I / World War II 75 Cannone da 75/27 modello 11 World War I / World War II 75 Cannone da 75/32 modello 37 World War II 75 Canon de 75 mle TR World War I / World War II 75 Type 38 75 mm field gunUS War Dept.
